Main Title by [[Howard Shore]] | animator= | studio=[[Amazon Studios]] | distributor= | released=[[30 September]] [[2022]] | runtime=69 minutes | country= | language= | budget= | gross= | website= | imdb_id=11609042 | gallery=The Rings of Power (TV series) | previous=[[Partings]] | next=[[The Eye]] }} {{Quote|[[Adar (The Rings of Power)|Adar]] and his army march on [[Watchtower of Ostirith|Ostirith]].|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}} '''Udûn''' is the sixth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', released on [[30 September]], [[2022]]. == Synopsis == === Númenor === === Southlands === == Cast == === Credited === :''In order of appearance'' (in episode credits) {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! Role |- | [[Ian Blackburn]] || [[Rowan (The Rings of Power)|Rowan (corpse)]] |} == Trivia == Below is a list of trivia from Amazon's "X-Ray" feature that accompanied the episode. * Scene 2 - "Most of the details and elaborations told herein are derived from '[[The Lord of the Rings]]', its prologue entitled '[[Concerning Hobbits]]', and its [[Appendices]], [[Appendix A|A]] through [[Appendix F|F]], where the intrepid traveler may journey to discover even farther horizons." == Production == == Differences == All these events that happen and have to do about [[Mount Doom|Orodruin]] (eruption, destruction of [[Tirharad]] e.t.c.) never happen in any of Tolkien's books. == Reception == == External links == * [https://rop.digitaltolkien.com/S1E6/ Udûn] at ROP Data * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4_N-SNjUnUI&ab_channel=RingsandRealms Episode analysis on Rings & Realms] (with [[Corey Olsen]]) * [https://bearmccreary.com/the-lord-of-the-rings-episode-106/ Scoring ''Udûn''] by [[Bear McCreary]] {{references}} {{rop-episodes}} {{title}} [[Category:The Rings of Power (TV series) episodes|05]] [[fi:Udûn (jakso)]]
